text:
JumpCloud | Engineering+Support+Product Roles | Boulder, Colorado | Full-Time | ONSITE| https://jumpcloud.com/careers/#careers Design and build the next generation of identity management and directory software. We’ve built a disruptive new technology called Directory-as-a-Service® and it is reinventing a two-decade-old monopoly, giving organizations freedom of choice with their IT solutions.

-Sr. Software Engineer: Production exp w/C++, Java, Python or Node and willingness to learn Go (golang)

-Software Engineer in Test (SDET)- 5 yrs Go or Python ideal or exp with multi-lang (C++, Ruby, Perl); noSQL

-Software Engineer (OS Applications): Develop agent technology; Native desktop devs; system-level api work
